entries.name: Aboleth
entries.description: An ancient psionic aberration dwelling in dark waters.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Mucous Cloud
traits.description: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by transformative mucus. A creature that touches the aboleth or that hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is diseased for 1d4 hours. The diseased creature can breathe only underwater.

traits.name: Probing Telepathy
traits.description: If a creature communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires if the aboleth can see the creature.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The aboleth makes three tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become diseased. The disease has no effect for 1 minute and can be removed by any magic that cures disease. After 1 minute, the diseased creature's skin becomes translucent and slimy, the creature can't regain hit points unless it is underwater, and the disease can be removed only by heal or another disease-curing spell of 6th level or higher. When the creature is outside a body of water, it takes 6 (1d12) acid damage every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to the skin before 10 minutes have passed.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Enslave (3/Day)
actions.description:
The aboleth targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed by the aboleth until the aboleth dies or until it is on a different plane of existence from the target. The charmed target is under the aboleth's control and can't take reactions, and the aboleth and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance.

Whenever the charmed target takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends. No more than once every 24 hours, the target can also repeat the saving throw when it is at least 1 mile away from the aboleth.

legendaryActions.name: Detect
legendaryActions.description: The aboleth makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendaryActions.name: Tail Swipe
legendaryActions.description: The aboleth makes one tail attack.

legendaryActions.name: Psychic Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
legendaryActions.description: One creature charmed by the aboleth takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage, and the aboleth regains hit points equal to the damage the creature takes.

entries.name: Death Slaad
entries.description: The most powerful type of slaad, capable of deadly magic.

data.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 18

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.description: The slaad can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description:
The slaad's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The slaad can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: detect magic, detect thoughts, invisibility (self only), mage hand, major image
2/day each: fear, fireball, fly, tongues
1/day each: cloudkill, plane shift

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws or greatsword.

actions.name: Bite (Slaad Form Only)
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claws (Slaad Form Only)
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

entries.name: Deva
entries.description: A benevolent celestial servant of good-aligned deities.

data.damageResistances: radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Angelic Weapons
traits.description: The deva's weapon attacks are magical. When the deva hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 4d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description:
The deva's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). The deva can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

At will: detect evil and good
1/day each: commune, raise dead

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The deva has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The deva makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Mace
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
actions.description: The deva touches another creature. The target magically regains 20 (4d8 + 2) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.description:
The deva magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the deva's choice).

In a new form, the deva retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks.

entries.name: Guardian Naga
entries.description: A noble serpent dedicated to protecting sacred sites.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.description: If it dies, the naga returns to life in 1d6 days and regains all its hit points. Only a wish spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.description:
The naga is an 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks), and it needs only verbal components to cast its spells. It has the following cleric spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): mending, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, shield of faith
2nd level (3 slots): calm emotions, hold person
3rd level (3 slots): bestow curse, clairvoyance
4th level (3 slots): banishment, freedom of movement
5th level (2 slots): flame strike, geas
6th level (1 slot): true seeing

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Spit Poison
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one creature. Hit: The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Stone Golem
entries.description: A massive construct carved from stone and animated by magic.

data.damageImmunities: poison, psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
data.conditionImmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
data.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.description: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The golem makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Slow (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Yochlol
entries.description: A shapeshifting demon servant of Lolth.

data.damageResistances: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.description: The yochlol can use its action to polymorph into a form that resembles a female drow or giant spider, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description:
The yochlol's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The yochlol can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: detect thoughts, web
1/day each: dominate person, teleport

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The yochlol has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The yochlol can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.description: The yochlol ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Multiattack (Bite Form Only)
actions.description: The yochlol makes two attacks, either with its touch or its slam.

actions.name: Slam (Spider or True Form Only)
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (6d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Touch (Drow Form Only)
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (6d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Mist Form (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.description: The yochlol transforms into toxic mist or reverts to its true form. As mist, the yochlol gains a flying speed of 30 feet and can hover. It can pass through small holes, narrow openings, and even mere cracks, but it treats liquids as though they were solid surfaces. The mist has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage. While in mist form, the yochlol can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. Any objects it was carrying or wearing are left behind when it transforms. The yochlol reverts to its true form after 1 hour or when it drops to 0 hit points.

actions.name: Stunning Touch (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The yochlol touches one creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the yochlol's next turn.

entries.name: Young Gold Dragon
entries.description: A young metallic dragon known for wisdom and justice.

data.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 19

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description:
The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

Fire Breath: The dragon exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 (10d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Weakening Breath: The dragon exhales gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or have disadvantage on Strength-based attack rolls, Strength checks, and Strength saving throws for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Young Red Dragon
entries.description: A young chromatic dragon known for greed and wrath.

data.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 18

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The dragon exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 (16d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
